title: Enacts the community notification and empowerment act which provides criteria for siting state facilities in N.Y. city
summary: Enacts the "community notification and empowerment act"; requires state agencies proposing an opening, expansion or reduction of a state facility in a city with a population of one million or more to submit a written proposal of such to the community planning board, the city planning commission, the city council member representing the area, the state senator and assemblyperson representing the area and the borough president.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing criteria for the location of state facilities in cities with a population of one million or more
